scripts.dev:chrome: bun run generate-manifest.js chrome && bun build --watch src/index.js --outfile dist/index.js
scripts.dev:firefox: bun run generate-manifest.js firefox && bun build --watch src/index.js --outfile dist/index.js
scripts.build:chrome: bun run generate-manifest.js chrome && bun build src/index.js --outfile dist/index.js
scripts.build:firefox: bun run generate-manifest.js firefox && bun build src/index.js --outfile dist/index.js
